Never share your password with anyone, not even IT support.
Enable two-factor authentication on all important accounts.
Keep your software and operating system up to date.
Back up your important data regularly to multiple locations.
Be skeptical of urgent emails asking for personal information.
Use different passwords for different accounts.
Lock your computer when stepping away from your desk.
Verify website URLs before entering sensitive information.
Avoid using public computers for banking or sensitive tasks.
Report security incidents immediately to your IT team.
